staxel.village.dialogue.Orderly.line:100: Why are the paths around here always so dirty?
It's like no one ever tidies up...
If I was mayor I wouldn't leave all those papers lying around...
How do they stay in order?
No one around here seems to take their shoes off indoors.
Then again, I guess I'm guilty of that too...
I always carry a ^c:d03e37;broom^c:pop; around with me.
You never know when it might come in handy!
There are far too many youngsters in this town...
It's hard to find anyone who shares my concerns.
Just a few more seasons and I'll be all set!
My campaign is in its final stages of preparation.
I just need to secure the support of a few more influential residents...
I'll make sure this village stays clean!
Every morning I'm forced to confront a horrible truth...
Our streets are not straight enough.
I'd really like to talk to our town planner...
The town's layout is a mess! Not orderly at all!
I would suggest aligning tiles carefully when you decorate.
One resident accidentally placed the wrong tile in the plaza...
He disappeared the following night and was never heard from again.
Just a friendly warning.
